title: U.N. in the classroom
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Education of children
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Activity programs in education
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Education - Experimental methods
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/United Nations
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Education of children
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Education of children
description: With minimum supervision from their teacher, seventh-grade school children conduct a model classroom assembly, patterned after a session of the United Nations, and debate an issue. The film demonstrates an original approach in helping children get to know the world they live in.
